name: The IT Imaging and Printing Industry Europe
goal: EURIMAG aims to represent its members in all of these issues, and others, covering the European IT Imaging and Printing industry in Europe. To this end, EURIMAG is committed to: Competitiveness: Contributing to reinforcing the competitiveness of the European economy and work towards identifying and removing barriers that prevent the well-functioning of the EU Internal Market; Innovation: Working towards a regulatory environment that not only protects but also encourages innovation, including a modernized European framework for Intellectual Property Rights; Consumers: Maintaining a constant and constructive dialogue with consumer associations at national and European level; Culture and Education: Working towards the creation of a policy environment that will further facilitate and strengthen the beneficial relationship between imaging technologies and the areas of culture and education; Copyright levies: Achieving a balanced EU copyright levies framework
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: European policy areas covered by the organization include issues around the IT imaging and printing industry in Europe, including the Digital Single Market, copyright policy, IP consumer issues, e-commerce and environmental issues
